LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Fishing_I_disabled.label: Fishing Bot (disabled)
LanguageData.RPP_Bot_Fishing_I_disabled.description: This is the sad end of a home bot. It's no longer useful and needs heavy repairs or dismantling.
